name: "Dead Like Me"- Mason Quiz / Test | Dead Like Me | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Callum Blue.

	Callum Blue was born in England in 1978. He has three sisters. He's also been in the television show "Relations" and the movie "The Princess Diaries 2" as Andrew Jacoby.

British.

	As you can guess from his accent, Mason is British. He was originally stationed as a Reaper in London, having been transferred to Seattle long before the series started.

Trepanantion.

	Mason drilled a hole in his head seeking a permanent high, and his enjoyment of drugs has not lessened in the afterlife. In the episode "Sunday Mornings", Mason accompanies George to a college campus to get some drugs.

Alcohol.

	Although Mason frequently talks about drugs, it is confirmed that he is addicted to alcohol, mainly due to the pressures of his job. In the first episode of the second season, Mason is sober, but this does not last long.

questions.text: On which other Reaper does Mason have a crush?
questions.explanation:
Daisy Adair.

	Although Mason likes to hit on anything human and female, he consistently flirts with fellow Reaper Daisy Adair. Sadly, she seems impervious to his charms, if Mason has any charm.

questions.text: In which decade did Mason die?
questions.explanation:
1960's.

	Specifically, Mason died in 1966, having been born in 1939. For those of you who can't be bothered with the math, he was 27.

questions.text: Mason claims to have Reaped a musician in 1969. Which band did the musician play with?
questions.explanation:
The Rolling Stones.

	Mason claims to have Reaped Rolling Stones guitarist Brian Jones in 1969, roughly three years into Mason's job as a Reaper. Jones was found dead in his swimming pool June 3rd of that year.

questions.text: Mason has a regular day job.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Out of the Reapers, only George and Roxy have steady day jobs. It makes you wonder how the rest of the crew pays for their daily breakfast at Der Wafflehaus.

questions.text: In the season one episode "Sunday Mornings", where does Mason accompany George?
questions.explanation:
A college campus.

	Mason goes with George, who has a Reap there, to get some drugs. While there, Mason saves a girl from being raped by hitting her would-be assailant with a fire extinguisher!

questions.text: In the episode "Business Unfinished", what does Mason cede control of in order to benefit from Daisy's con game?
questions.explanation:
His house.

	Mason lives in a house belonging to an elderly woman he Reaped earlier in the season. He lets Daisy use it to hold a fake seance for a wealthy woman's son. However, when Rube and the Plague Division bust the operation, Mason jumps out the back window.
